name: awsSupport
description: This will gather AWS support-related information from the user to assist with troubleshooting or resolving issues.

description.description: It will aws support-related description from the user.

name: awsWorkSpaceProvision
description: This will gather AWS support-related information from the user to assist with troubleshooting or resolving AWS WorkSpace provisioning issues.

requestDetails.description: Description of the support request or issue related to AWS WorkSpace that the user needs assistance with.

workStation/floor.description: Location of the workstation, including the floor number, to help AWS support understand the setup context.

contactNumber/deskExtension.description: User's contact number or desk extension to facilitate follow-up communication by AWS support.

name: awsService
description: This will gather detailed information related to an AWS WorkSpace provisioning service request. It assists in troubleshooting or resolving issues related to user setup, connectivity, and configuration in AWS WorkSpaces.

requestDetails.description: A detailed description of the service request or issue related to AWS WorkSpace, including any errors, configuration problems, or setup challenges encountered.

workStation/floor.description: The physical location of the workstation, including the floor number, to provide context for AWS support when addressing the provisioning issue.

contactNumber/deskExtension.description: The user's contact number or desk extension, so AWS support can reach out for any follow-up or clarification regarding the service request.

name: unBlockUrl
description: This will get the unblock url from user to create the ticket.

url.description: Please provide the url to unblock.

description.description: Please give the description under which its getting blocked.
